Transformation

Class DBTransformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Transformation.Transformation
      • Transformation.DBTransformation

  • public class DBTransformation
extends Transformation
    Analyse the database to find a way to add the foreign key (change the type of the Foreignkey and/or the reference, the cascade transformation, and can processed the unmatching values)

    • Constructor Detail

      • DBTransformation

        public DBTransformation(SQLQueryFactory sqlFactory,
                        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Table> tableDico,
                        ForeignKey fk,
                        TransformationTarget target,
                        java.lang.String newType,
                        TransformationType transforamtiontype)
        DBTransformation constructor
        Parameters:
        sqlFactory - SQLFactory linked the the database
        tableDico - Hashmap containt the Table object that don't have to be loade directli from the database metadata (= intern represnetation of the DB)
        fk - ForeignKey that we want to add
        target - Column(s) that will be transformed by the transformation ()
        newType - new type given to the target column (and these potentials "cascade column")
        transforamtiontype - information about the type of transformation (instantiated by the ContextAnalyser)

      • DBTransformation

                        java.lang.String dataBasePortNumber,

                        TransformationType transforamtiontype)
        Deprecated. 
        DBTransformation constructor
        Parameters:
        dataBaseHostName - DB hostname
        dataBasePortNumber - DB port number
        dataBaseLogin - DB login
        dataBasePassword - DB password of the given login
        tableDico - Hashmap containt the Table object that don't have to be loade directli from the database metadata (= intern represnetation of the DB)
        fk - ForeignKey that we want to add
        target - Column(s) that will be transformed by the transformation ()
        newType - new type given to the target column (and these potentials "cascade column")
        transforamtiontype - information about the type of transformation (instantiated by the ContextAnalyser)

      • transfrom

        public void transfrom()
               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Make a direct transformation on the database the add the given Foreign key. Change the type of the "target" (target attribut) to the "newType"(attribut) and make the some of the cascade column delet or set null the unmatching value according the "cascadeChoice" (attribut) value. finally adding the foreign key constraint.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there are some probleme with the DB

      • unDoTransformation

        public void unDoTransformation()
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        undo the DB transformation Require the execution of the transfrom() method first not suported if there was some unmatching value during the previous transformation
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there are some probleme with the DB

      • analyse

        public void analyse()
        use the intern representation ("tableDico" attribut) the database metadata to analyse if the charset match, if there are some unmatching value and if there are some potential cascade transformation to proceed. This methode instantiates the attributs : ArrayList ‹ String › unmatchingValue, HashMap ‹ TransformationTarget,ArrayList ‹ ForeignKey › › cascadeFkMap, boolean encodageMatching, Column fkColumnBeforeTransformation, Column refColumnBeforeTransformation, SQLAlterTableQuery addFkQuery

      • makeCascadeTransformation

        public void makeCascadeTransformation()
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getTransformationScript

        public java.lang.String getTransformationScript()
                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns:
        A String that contains the script to proceeds to the adding of the Foreign key
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there are some probleme with de database
